verbose_text: Increased flexibility is unlikely to explain why PP2A-B56 cannot silence the SAC, however, given that insertion of a flexible linker immediately before the PP2A binding motif in BUBR1 does not affect MELT dephosphorylation or SAC silencing in either the presence or absence of PP1-KNL1 (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: dephosphorylation or SAC silencing in either the presence or absence of PP1-KNL1
